data.message: They say build important groups for people in your life. Well I had the AAMBER ALERT group (app) on my Profilee and Facebook had removed it not allpwing me to add any missinig children. I was emailed  just this morning from the AMBER ALERT program about 2 (two) young boys age 4 and 2 that were abducted in California. When I try to even post it to my profile am being told it's to long of a post, now can anyone tellme is this not an important group foir imformation like this to be shared not only with my friends , but I believe it would have a domini affect my friends, to thier friend, then thier friends ect ect ......
